title: UK Plymouth Seaside Escape Overlooking Hoe Park
description: Discover seaside serenity and rugged headlands with a stay at the modern Crowne Plaza Plymouth, an IHG Hotel. Steps from your enviable position, take a stroll to gin distilleries and gripping theatre.
